授業目的:
The objectives of this course are:
1. To develop students’ TOEIC listening skills
2. To develop students’ TOEIC reading skills
3. To help students build their vocabulary knowledge
4. To help students improve their overall test-taking strategies
5. To help students become aware of common distractors
6. To help students better understand English as it is used in everyday work and life situations
到達目標:
1. Students will develop their listening and reading skills.
2. Students will strengthen their vocabulary knowledge.
3. Students will become better test-takers, carefully attentive to common distractors.
4. Students will familiarize themselves with natural English.
授業方法:
1. This course will be conducted in English only and English will be the means of communication between the students and the instructor. (Students will also be expected to communicate with one another in English.)
2. Students are encouraged to actively participate in class discussions, both independently and collaboratively, in order to enhance their competence and confidence in English and also to create a better learning environment for all.

トピック.授業外学習2: One to two hours of homework can be expected each week, including each unit’s “Further Study” section and quiz.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: Students’ final grade will derive from a combination of assignments, activities, mini-tests, etc.
